mapper.select: select count(*) from xrbj1506_coupon with(nolock) where askType=#{askType} and inviterId=#{userId} and userId != #{userId} and inviteChannelType=#{channelType} and couponTime between #{fromTime} and #{toTime}
select count(*) from xrbj1506_coupon with(nolock) where askType=#{askType} and userId=#{userId} and channelType=#{channelType} and couponTime between #{fromTime} and #{toTime}

select promoCode, askType, u.nickName as inviterName, couponTime from xrbj1506_coupon c with(nolock) left join xrbj1506_user u with(nolock) on c.inviterId=u.userId where c.userId=#{userId} and c.channelType=#{channelType} order by c.couponTime desc
select top 1 promoCode from xrbj1506_coupon with(nolock) where isUsed=0 and userId=#{userId} and channelType=#{channelType} order by couponTime desc
